info.book: BioNLP Workshop on Linking Natural Language and Biology
info.title: Mining Biomedical Texts for Disease-Related Pathways

sections.heading: Abstract
text: I will describe my collaborators' and my own effort to compile large models of molecular pathways in complex human disorders.
The talk will address a number of interrelated questions: How to extract facts from texts at a large scale?
How to assess the quality of the extracted facts?
How to identify sets of conflicting or unreliable facts and to generate an internally consistent model?
How to use the resulting pathway model for automated generation of biological hypotheses?
